mapper.update: update tal_nameplate set displayDate = #{displaydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, minBarCode = #{minbarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maxBarCode = #{maxbarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitCode = #{unitcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lineType = #{linetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, printOrNot = #{printornot,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, displayDate, minBarCode, maxBarCode, unitCode, lineType, printOrNot,barCodeNum from tal_nameplate where 1=1
select a.*, b.* from tal_nameplate a inner join tal_customercode b on a.unitCode = b.C_unitCode where 1=1 ${filter}
